description: Our place is close to The M and L trains with direct access to Bushwick, Williamsburg, and Lower Manhattan. There is a playground across the street for kids too.. You’ll love my place because we are in the heart of Ridgewood-- a quiet, safe neighborhood. We have a backyard and live across the street from a park. There are neighborhood bars, a grocery store one block away. Our neighbors are polite and quiet too. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and families (with kids).
name: Quiet, 2 bedroom / backyard
review: The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.
